variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for Nunavut 2025 tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 4% on the portion of income up to $54,707. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 7% on the portion of income over $54,707 up to $109,413. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 9% on the portion of income over $109,413 up to $177,881. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 11.5% on the portion of income over $177,881. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_4 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all four brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
